A student profile can be added to a student body subdivision by any of the following methods:
Select StudentAdd.
Press Add student button on the toolbar.
Select Add student item from either school or subdivision context menu (see ).
Press the Add button in the properties panel of a newly created subdivision ( ).
Use the Alt + A keyboard shortcut.
A student profile window ( ) will appear on your screen (see ).
Press the Add button or Enter key to apply the changes. Press Cancel or Esc to cancel it.
